This e-petition has been launched to protect UK Public Services from future radicalisation and politicising from one Political Party’s ideology.

2010 to 1012 has seen radical and vast changes to the NHS, the Police Service and other Public Services yet only 27.2 million voters were motivated to vote at all in the last General Election in May 2010. That’s less than half the adult population and just over a quarter of the total population of the UK.

Is it fair that a Government produced from a Hung Parliament has so much power to make such drastic change to what belongs to Society?

I put forward that a Ministry of Public Service be developed as a cross party board of ethics to Govern UK Public Services and produce policy and legislation that’s best for society not just one Political Party’s ideology.

The Ministry would be responsible for the commissioning of ALL UK Public Services.
